frame.name: Information_display
frame.definition:
<def-root>A man-made artifact, digital or physical, which is used to display information presented via the object.
<ex><fex name="Name">4chan</fex> is an <fex name="Type"><t>image</t></fex> <t>board</t> <fex name="Use">for discussing gaming and internet culture</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Display
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the entity or substance that is designed to have a particular <fen>Use</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Use
FE.definition: <def-root>The use for which a display is intended.</def-root>

FE.name: Creator
FE.definition: <def-root>An individual or individuals that bring the <fen>Display</fen> into existence.</def-root>

FE.name: Time_of_creation
FE.definition: <def-root>The time at which an <fen>Display</fen> comes into existence.</def-root>

FE.name: Name
FE.definition: <def-root>The term used to refer to an <fen>Display</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Material
FE.definition: <def-root>Any indication of what makes up the <fen>Display</fen>, including components, code, etc.</def-root>

lexUnit.name: board [forum].n
lexUnit.definition: FN: An entity in which multiple users display information, responding to posts and creating new ones.

lexUnit.name: board [white/black/chalk].n
lexUnit.definition: FN: A flat, smooth surface which is written on, often with a specific implement, in order to display information. (ex. whiteboard, chalkboard)

lexUnit.name: monitor.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: A digital display connected to a computer.
